EnvironmentSuffix.Description: Suffix for resource names to support multiple parallel deployments (e.g., PR number from CI/CD)
EnvironmentSuffix.ConstraintDescription: Must contain only alphanumeric characters and hyphens

DBUsername.ConstraintDescription: Must begin with a letter and contain only alphanumeric characters

AllowedCIDRBlock.Description: CIDR block for allowed incoming connections
AllowedCIDRBlock.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid CIDR block

SourceAmiIdSsmParameter.Description: SSM parameter name holding the AMI ID (keeps template free of hard-coded AMI IDs)

S3BucketName.Description: S3 bucket name for payment data

S3BucketArn.Description: S3 bucket ARN for payment data
